summary: In the hands of terrorists, radioactive material could be used for a dirty bomb. The Nuclear Regulatory Commission considers the health risks from short-term radiation exposure when determining how to safeguard radioactive material. But experts told us factors such as deaths during an evacuation and the cost of environmental cleanup should also be considered. We recommended , among other things, that the NRC consider these...
title: Combating Nuclear Terrorism: NRC Needs to Take Additional Actions to Ensure the Security of High-Risk Radioactive Material
